rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with an open-plan living space. The layout follows Vastu principles by placing the main door to the east, ensuring a flow of positive energy.
A dedicated home theater area with soundproofing and comfortable seating. Vastu guidelines suggest positioning it in the south-west corner for balanced acoustics.
Compact kitchenette located near the living area with ample storage, ensuring efficient workflow while adhering to Vastu placement (east or north-east corner).
A quiet space for work and study. Placed in the north-west zone, providing a serene environment as per Vastu.
Essential bathroom facilities located conveniently on the ground floor for easy access, placed in a position that respects Vastu by avoiding direct alignment with main entrance.

openings.description: The primary entry door positioned to the east as per Vastu, ensuring a welcoming and auspicious entrance.
Large windows on both north and south sides for natural light, ventilation, and adherence to Vastu guidelines on proper room orientation.
